metadata.description: Two stories in one world. Coin Operated Boy tells the tales of two self-aware robots and their relationships with their respective creators. Genesis wants a love without complications and she'll engineer the perfect boy to get it. Enter Daniel, Genie's clockwork creation. Then, Sara thinks she is a girl just like any other, but when the reality that she's an android hits her, she hits back.
metadata.name: Coin Operated Boy
